name: Publish Docker

on:
  push:
    branches:
      - master

jobs:
  push_to_registry:
    name: Push docker image to Docker Hub
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest

    steps:
    - name: Checkout repo
      uses: actions/checkout@v4

    - name: Login to Docker Hub
      uses: docker/login-action@v3
      with:
        username: ${{ secrets.DOCKERHUB_USER }}
        password: ${{ secrets.DOCKERHUB_TOKEN }}
        
    - name: Build and push API image
      run: |
        docker build -t ${{ secrets.DOCKERHUB_USER }}/api:latest ./api
        docker push ${{ secrets.DOCKERHUB_USER }}/api:latest

    - name: Build and push web image
      run: |
        docker build -t ${{ secrets.DOCKERHUB_USER }}/client:docker ./client
        docker push ${{ secrets.DOCKERHUB_USER }}/client:latest

    - name: Build and push PostgreSQL image
      run: |
        docker pull postgres:15-alpine
        docker tag postgres:15-alpine ${{ secrets.DOCKERHUB_USER }}/postgres:latest
        docker push ${{ secrets.DOCKERHUB_USER }}/postgres:latest

    - name: Metadata tags for API image
      uses: docker/metadata-action@v3
      with:
        images: cheskapg/colina-api:api-latest
        tags: latest, v1.0

    - name: Metadata tags for frontend web image
      uses: docker/metadata-action@v3
      with:
        images: cheskapg/colina-web:colina-web-latest
        tags: latest, v1.0

    - name: Metadata tags for PostgreSQL image
      uses: docker/metadata-action@v3
      with:
        images: cheskapg/colina-postgres:postgres-latest
        tags: latest, v1.0
